snippet.title: Into the Stars - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Into the Stars on Steam: 
http://store.steampowered.com/app/360510/

Take the role of Captain in this Space Survival Simulation as you explore a massive star system in search of a new home for humanity. Outfit your ship, hand pick your crew and set off on a journey through an open-world where you must scavenge resources, shelter civilians and outrun a hostile alien force.

Looking for more information on Into the Stars? Check out the following channels:

Official website: http://www.fugitive-games.com
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/intothestars
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/intothestarsgame
Twitter: http://twitter.com/fugitivegames / http://twitter.com/Iceberg_Int #IntotheStars

Get Into the Stars on Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/360510
